bibl.title: A Fragment of an Early Christian Hymn (Papyrus Bodmer 12): Some Observations. Avec résumé en allemand.
bibl.note: A version of this paper was presented on 19 May, 2008, in the English-German Colloquium in New Testament, Universität Tübingen. - [Introduction.] - The Bodmer Miscellaneous Codex. - The Hymn Fragment (Papyrus Bodmer 12) [P. Bodmer XII (= van Haelst 681; LDAB 2565)]. - Some Observations on Specific Aspects of the Hymn fragment. - Conclusion. - Pp. 413-414: Appendix: Text and Translations of the hymn fragment (Papyrus Bodmer 12).
